benchmark_details.name: FinanceQA
benchmark_details.overview: FinanceQA is a testing suite that evaluates LLMsâ€™ performance on complex numerical financial analysis tasks that mirror real-world investment work.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To address the limitations of current LLMs in financial applications by providing a benchmark that emphasizes technical precision and analytical reasoning.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: Limited to evaluating LLMs using solely tactical questions based on data from specific companies.

data.source: Created by human annotators with experience at hedge funds, private equity firms, or investment banks based on primary financial documents.
data.annotation: Manually verified and created by financial professionals who developed useful questions for their real-world work.

methodology.calculation: Exact correct matches for evaluating performance.
methodology.interpretation: A score of 1 for correctly factored assumptions and lines of reasoning, 0 for incorrect matches.
methodology.baseline_results: Top SOTA model, o1, performed at a ~48.7% accuracy rate.
methodology.validation: Statistical significance tests were performed to validate improvements.
